question.title: Amazing Strings
question.content:
Given 3 Strings, check whether the 3rd string contains all the characters of string 1 and 2 in any order. If all the characters are present, print "YES" otherwise print "NO".

There should not be any extra character and any missing character.

The string s contains uppercase Latin letters only.

Input format :
Line 1 : First String
Line 2 : Second String
Line 3 : Third String
Output format :
YES or NO
Constraints :

1 <= n (Length of 1st & 2nd Strings) <= 100

Sample Input 1 :
SANTACLAUS
DEDMOROZ
SANTAMOROZDEDCLAUS
Sample Output 1 :
YES
Sample Input 2 :
PAPAINOEL
JOULUPUKKI
JOULNAPAOILELUPUKKI
Sample Output 2 :
NO
Sample Input 3 :
BABBONATALE
FATHERCHRISTMAS
BABCHRISTMASBONATALLEFATHER
Sample Output 3 :
NO
Sample Output Explanation :

Output 1 : the letters written in the last line can be used to write the names and there won't be any extra letters left.

Output 2 : Letter "P" is missing and there's an extra letter "L"

Output 3 : There's an extra letter "L"

rephrased.body: Given three strings, determine if the third string can be formed by combining all the characters from the first two strings exactly once each, without any extra or missing characters. The strings consist of uppercase Latin letters only.
constraints: The strings contain uppercase Latin letters only.
There should not be any extra character and any missing character.

testcases.explanation: The letters in the third string can be used to form both the first and second strings without any extra or missing characters.
The third string is missing the letter 'P' and contains an extra letter 'L'.
The third string contains an extra letter 'L'.
The third string contains all the characters from the first and second strings exactly once each.
The third string is missing the letters 'C' and 'F'.
The third string contains all the characters from the first and second strings exactly once each.
String s is not a combination of s1 and s2, s should be AABB
The third string contains all the characters from the first and second strings exactly once each.
